Package org.openscience.cdk.atomtype

Class MM2AtomTypeMatcher

java.lang.Object
org.openscience.cdk.atomtype.MM2AtomTypeMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAtomTypeMatcher
@Deprecated public class MM2AtomTypeMatcher extends Object implements IAtomTypeMatcher
Deprecated.
Incomplete and error prone - use at your own risk.
Class implements methods to assign mmff94 atom types for a specific atom in an molecule.

cho

    • findMatchingAtomType

      public IAtomType findMatchingAtomType(IAtomContainer atomContainer, IAtom atomInterface) throws CDKException
      Deprecated.
      Assign the mm2 atom type to a given atom. Before this method can be called the following has to be done: 
       atomContainer = (AtomContainer)atomTypeTools.assignAtomTypePropertiesToAtom(
   new Molecule(atomContainer)
 );
      Specified by:
